snippet: Mike Scott ended a scoring slump with 26 points and the Atlanta Hawks beat Cleveland 117-98 on Friday night in a costly setback for the Cavaliers' late-season playoff push....

headline.print_headline: Scott, Hawks Hurt Cavaliers' Playoff Push, 117-98
headline.main: Scott, Hawks Hurt Cavaliers' Playoff Push, 117-98

lead_paragraph: Mike Scott ended a scoring slump with 26 points and the Atlanta Hawks beat Cleveland 117-98 on Friday night in a costly setback for the Cavaliers' late-season playoff push.
